channel.title: Free *Universal* RSC private server bot!
channel.description:
Vortexbot is hands down the best rsc private server bot out and it's free to use.
Features:
- Universal bot, can be used with any rsc server that is using the rscd source - Autologin - Toggle GFX - Show HP - Chatcheck (beeps when someone talks) - Attack last player attacked - Easy to script + Tons of premade scripts - Great community and great mods - Mostly noob friendly
[url=http://www.vortexbot.com]www.vortexbot.com[/url] Register There and post 5 times to view downloads!

item.title: Free *Universal* RSC private server bot!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“kingigor55, post:6, topic:233833”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=308324.msg2465336#msg2465336 date=1222672317]

Vortexbot is hands down the best rsc private server bot out

I stopped reading there.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2008, 01:17:29 am[/size][hr][quote author=Peter link=topic=308324.msg2465236#msg2465236 date=1222661924]

Notice that I have nothing to do with this anymore.

Understood that the second I read this:

We have updated the clinet so you can now use vortexbot on many private servers such as rsc legends and project p2p and many others. look in the vortexbot download section on how to change setting.
Update to VortexBot V3.0 today avoid getting banned
it has come to our attention that rsca has implemented a system were it logs when you type /run. We fixed this problem so please download the new version to avoid being banned. Read the instruction on the downloads page to determine how to start scripts ect.
[/quote]

took long enough to figure out how to use return; ?
[/quote]

Listen to this man he knows what he is talking about.[/quote]
I thought I would fix it for you…

Read full topic

Vortexbot is hands down the best rsc private server bot out and it’s free to use.

Features:

  • Universal bot, can be used with any rsc server that is using the rscd source
  • Autologin
  • Toggle GFX
  • Show HP
  • Chatcheck (beeps when someone talks)

  • Great community and great mods
  • Mostly noob friendly
